titleStmt.title: Mill'd lead sheathing for ships against the worm, plainly proved to be better than the best and above cent. per cent. cheaper than the ordinariest wood-sheathing can be; besides divers other advantages to the publick. The particulars are more at large contained in the book under-mentioned, referred to in the margent.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Charles, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Publication date given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
